original_text: But the people of Israel broke faith in regard to the devoted things, for Achan the son of Carmi, son of Zabdi, son of Zerah, of the tribe of Judah, took some of the devoted things. And the anger of the Lord burned against the people of Israel.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손들이 온전히 바친 물건으로 말미암아 범죄하였으니 이는 유다 지파 세라의 증손 삽디의 손자 갈미의 아들 아간이 온전히 바친 물건을 가졌음이라 여호와께서 이스라엘 자손들에게 진노하시니라

sentences.original_text: But the people of Israel broke faith
in regard to the devoted things,
for Achan the son of Carmi,
son of Zabdi, son of Zerah,
took some of the devoted things.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 진멸할 것들 중에서 얼마를 가져갔기 때문입니다.

sentences.original_text: And the anger of the Lord
burned against the people of Israel.
